name: Candore
description:
We at Vomini currently work in a group of two people consisting in a programmer and a 3d artist , for this especific project we had the help of a wonderfull sound designer that we met at the GameDev Insider  GameJam discord server.

HOW TO PLAY:
You play as a pumpkin that has to avoid neon obstacules and collect all the orange candies scattered troughout the procedurally generated platafforms

WASD to move, the only objective is to collect candies and avoid the neon obstacles.

We hope you have a good time with our game!  :)
